title: How to Insert a Youtube Video in Prezi

steps.headline: Go to YouTube, find the video you want to insert, and copy its URL.
steps.description: Highlight the URL in your browser’s address bar and press Ctrl+c (Windows) or Command+c (Mac OS X) to copy.

steps.headline: Go to the Prezi your prezis page and log in using the email and password associated with your Prezi.com account.
Click the Prezi presentation you want to insert a YouTube video in from within the “Your prezis” section.
Click the “Edit prezi” button to enter the Prezi editor.
Click the “Insert” tab located at the top of the presentation.
Click the “YouTube video” under the insert tab.
Paste the URL of the YouTube video you want to insert by pressing Ctrl+v (Windows) or Command+v (Mac OS X) when prompted.
Click the “Insert” button to insert the video into your Prezi.

tyn: Adobe Flash Player 9 or higher installed
Internet Explorer 7 or higher, Firefox 3.0 or higher, or Safari 3 or higher
text: Go to YouTube, find the video you want to insert, and copy its URL. Highlight the URL in your browser’s address bar and press Ctrl+c (Windows) or Command+c (Mac OS X) to copy. Go to the Prezi your prezis page and log in using the email and password associated with your Prezi.com account.  Click the Prezi presentation you want to insert a YouTube video in from within the “Your prezis” section.  Click the “Edit prezi” button to enter the Prezi editor.  Click the “Insert” tab located at the top of the presentation.  Click the “YouTube video” under the insert tab.  Paste the URL of the YouTube video you want to insert by pressing Ctrl+v (Windows) or Command+v (Mac OS X) when prompted.  Click the “Insert” button to insert the video into your Prezi.

Highlight the URL in your browser’s address bar and press Ctrl+c (Windows) or Command+c (Mac OS X) to copy.
Go to the Prezi your prezis page and log in using the email and password associated with your Prezi.com account.
Click the Prezi presentation you want to insert a YouTube video in from within the “Your prezis” section.
Click the “Edit prezi” button to enter the Prezi editor.
Click the “Insert” tab located at the top of the presentation.
Click the “YouTube video” under the insert tab.
Paste the URL of the YouTube video you want to insert by pressing Ctrl+v (Windows) or Command+v (Mac OS X) when prompted.
Click the “Insert” button to insert the video into your Prezi.
